children.title: Full-Stack Php Developer
children.description: Was responsible for developing CORE (Centralized Online Real-Time Exchange) banking system. I was responsible for creating the advances and submissions module. I had to leave this job after only 2 months, because I had to move to Tomsk/RUSSIA for my master's degree.

children.title: Full-Stack Php Developer
children.description: Was responsible for integration of partners payment system as libraries/bundles for our system. All the integrated systems must have unit and/or functional tests. After integration finished the library gets tested for security issues and then deployed to production.

children.title: Full-Stack Php Developer
children.description: Was responsible for developing and maintaining our environment related, legal documents management system. This system based on added documents, creates notifications and calendar events reminding when it needs to be changed.

children.title: Web Security Analyst
children.description: Was responsible for penetration testing and analysing web applications, which are developed in variety of languages and frameworks. The results of each analysis are then documented with at least on solution for each found vulnerabilities. Also was responsible for developing the company's phishing application.

children.title: Java Developer
children.description: Was responsible for developing a desktop application to manage projects. It was basically a CRUD system with authentication and an advanced listing feature. Users not only could filter rows and enable/disable columns for listing, but also were able to join tables export data as Excel file.

children.title: Full-Stack C# Developer
children.company: İm Park Eğitim Bilişim Ltd. Şti.
children.description: Was responsible for developing distance Turkish learning system using MVC and Entity framework.
